00079 sbwSignatureList::~sbwSignatureList()
00080 {
00081         delete contents;
00082 }
00083 
00090 sbwSignatureList::sbwSignatureList(const char *&signature)
00091 {
00092         sbwSignature::consume("{", signature);
00093         contents = new SignatureListContents(signature);
00094         sbwSignature::consume("}", signature);
00095 }

00107         writer << list ;

00118 {
00119         sbwDataBlockReader **list = va_arg(ap, sbwDataBlockReader **);
00120 
00121         reader.getForC(*list) ;
00122 }

00184 SignatureListContents *sbwSignatureList::discardShell()
00185 {
00186         SignatureListContents *result = contents ;
00187         contents = NULL ;
00188         delete this ;
00189 
00190         return result ;
00191 }
00192 
00198 std::vector<SignatureElement> *sbwSignatureList::getContents()
00199 {
00200         return contents->copyVector();
00201 }
00202 
00209 bool sbwSignatureList::match(sbwSignatureType *other)
00210 {
00211         if (other->getType() != ListType)
00212                 return false;
00213 
00214         sbwSignatureList *otherList = (sbwSignatureList *)other ;
00215 
00216         return otherList->contents->size() == 0 || contents->size() == 0 || contents->match(*(otherList->contents));
00217 }
